com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1

Class TextToSpeech

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.text_to_speech.v1.TextToSpeech

  • public class TextToSpeech
extends WatsonService
    The Text to Speech service uses IBM's speech synthesis capabilities to convert text to an audio signal. The audio is streamed back to the client in a InputStream
    See Also:
    Text to Speech

      • getVoice

        public ServiceCall<Voice> getVoice(java.lang.String voiceName,
                                   java.lang.String customizationId)
        Lists information about the voice specified with the voice path parameter. Specify the customizationId parameter to obtain information for that custom voice model of the specified voice.
        Parameters:
        voiceName - the voice name
        customizationId - the customization id
        Returns:
        the Voice

      • getPronunciation

        public ServiceCall<Pronunciation> getPronunciation(java.lang.String word,
                                                   Voice voice,
                                                   Phoneme phoneme)
        Returns the phonetic pronunciation for the word specified.
        Parameters:
        word - The word for which the pronunciation is requested.
        voice - the voice to obtain the pronunciation for the specified word in the language of that voice.
        phoneme - the phoneme set in which to return the pronunciation
        Returns:
        the word pronunciation
        See Also:
        Pronunciation

      • getPronunciation

        public ServiceCall<Pronunciation> getPronunciation(java.lang.String word,
                                                   Voice voice,
                                                   Phoneme phoneme,
                                                   java.lang.String customizationId)
        Returns the phonetic pronunciation for the word specified.
        Parameters:
        word - The word for which the pronunciation is requested.
        voice - the voice to obtain the pronunciation for the specified word in the language of that voice.
        phoneme - the phoneme set in which to return the pronunciation
        customizationId - the customization id
        Returns:
        the word pronunciation
        See Also:
        Pronunciation

      • getCustomVoiceModel

      • saveCustomVoiceModel

        public ServiceCall<CustomVoiceModel> saveCustomVoiceModel(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Saves a CustomVoiceModel. If the given model has an id, this service will update an existing model. When no id is set, a new CustomVoiceModel is created and the id field set.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be saved
        Returns:
        a reference to the given CustomVoiceModel. If a new CustomVoiceModel is created, the id field will be populated.

      • deleteCustomVoiceModel

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> deleteCustomVoiceModel(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Deletes the given CustomVoiceModel (requires a valid id to be set).
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        Returns:
        the service call

      • getWords

        public ServiceCall<java.util.List<CustomTranslation>> getWords(CustomVoiceModel model)
        Gets all customized word translation of the given CustomVoiceModel.
        Parameters:
        model - the VoiceModel
        Returns:
        a list of all CustomTranslations

      • saveWords

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> saveWords(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                             CustomTranslation... translations)
        Saves or updates custom word translations. If no translation with the given word is existing, a new translation is created. Elsewise, the existing translation is updated.
        Parameters:
        model - the CustomVoiceModel
        translations - the translations to be saved or updated
        Returns:
        the service call

      • deleteWord

        public ServiceCall<java.lang.Void> deleteWord(CustomVoiceModel model,
                                              CustomTranslation translation)
        Deletes a custom word translation.
        Parameters:
        model - the CustomVoiceModel
        translation - the translation
        Returns:
        the service call
